short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sur.ly Surfguard shows safety status of a link before you click on it. It highlights links with adult or malware content.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sur.ly makes its best to protect users from many potential threats on the Web, including malware, scam or phishing pages, unsolicited adult content, etc. That's why Sur.ly Surfguard is connected to our own database of up-to-date web safety profiles: we use only credible public sources along with our comprehensive technology to research, determine, and bring together all vital safety indicators of any website.
